key.name: initiate-key
key.description: Initiate the shift switcher view via keyboard shortcut.

key.name: initiate-button
key.description: Initiate the shift switcher view via mouse button.

key.name: initiate-edge
key.description: Initiate the shift switcher view via screen corner or edge.

key.name: initiate-all-key
key.description: Initiate the shift switcher view via keyboard shortcut, taking into account all windows on all workspaces.

key.name: initiate-all-button
key.description: Initiate the shift switcher view via mouse button, taking into account all windows on all workspaces.

key.name: initiate-all-edge
key.description: Initiate the shift switcher view via screen corner or edge, taking into account all windows on all workspaces.

key.name: next-key
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the next window on the current workspace. Release to switch focus to the selected window.

key.name: next-button
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the next window on the current workspace. Release to switch focus to the selected window.

key.name: prev-key
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the previous window on the current workspace. Release to switch focus to the selected window.

key.name: prev-button
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the previous window on the current workspace. Release to switch focus to the selected window.

key.name: next-all-key
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the next window, taking into account all workspaces. Release to focus the selected window.

key.name: next-all-button
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the next window, taking into account all workspaces. Release to focus the selected window.

key.name: prev-all-key
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the previous window, taking into account all workspaces. Release to focus the selected window.

key.name: prev-all-button
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the previous window, taking into account all workspaces. Release to focus the selected window.

key.name: next-group-key
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the next window of the currently selected application. Release to focus the selected window.

key.name: next-group-button
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the next window of the currently selected application. Release to focus the selected window.

key.name: prev-group-key
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the previous window of the currently selected application. Release to focus the selected window.

key.name: prev-group-button
key.description: Reveals the shift switcher, if not visible and selects the previous window of the currently selected application. Release to focus the selected window.

key.name: window-match
key.description: Windows that should be shown in the shift switcher. (match)

key.name: minimized
key.description: Show windows that are minimized, shaded or in show desktop mode.

key.name: speed
key.description: Fade in/out speed (in seconds). (0.1 - 10.0)

key.name: shift-speed
key.description: Shift switcher animation speed. (0.1 - 5.0)

key.name: timestep
key.description: Shift switcher timestep. (0.1 - 50.0)

key.name: mouse-speed
key.description: Mouse movement speed. (0.1 - 50.0)

key.name: click-duration
key.description: Maximum click duration (in milliseconds). (10 - 2000)

key.name: size
key.description: Maximum window size (in percent of the screen width). (1 - 100)

key.name: background-intensity
key.description: The intensity of the background. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: hide-all
key.description: Hide all non Desktop windows during switching.

key.name: reflection
key.description: Render a reflection of shifted windows on the ground.

key.name: ground-color1
key.description: Color and opacity of the ground (near).

key.name: ground-color2
key.description: Color and opacity of the ground (far).

key.name: ground-size
key.description: Size of the ground the reflection is rendered on. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: intensity
key.description: The intensity of the reflection. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: overlay-icon
key.description: The type of icon overlay to draw on windows in the shift switcher. (0 = None, 1 = Emblem, 2 = Big)

key.name: mipmaps
key.description: Generate mipmaps for higher quality scaling.

key.name: multioutput-mode
key.description: Selects how the switcher is displayed, if multiple output devices are used. (0 = Disabled, 1 = On activated output, 2 = One big switcher)

key.name: mode
key.description: The selected shift switcher mode. (0 = Cover, 1 = Flip)

key.name: flip-rotation
key.description: Rotation angle of the flip animation (in degrees). (-80 - 80)

key.name: cover-offset
key.description: Cover movement offset. (-0.4 - 0.4)

key.name: cover-angle
key.description: How much windows should be tilted (in degrees). (0 - 360)

key.name: cover-extra-space
key.description: How much windows should be spaced apart. (1 - 2)

key.name: cover-max-visible-windows
key.description: The maximum number of windows visible in cover mode. (1 - 100)

key.name: window-title
key.description: Show the window title of the currently selected window.

key.name: title-font-bold
key.description: Render the window title using a bold font.

key.name: title-font-size
key.description: Font size of the window title text (in pixels). (6 - 96)

key.name: title-back-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the window title background.

key.name: title-font-color
key.description: Font color and opacity of the window title.

key.name: title-text-placement
key.description: Selects where to place the window title. (0 = Centered on screen, 1 = Top of screen minus offset, 2 = Bottom of screen plus offset)

key.name: vertical-offset
key.description: Vertical offset from top or bottom of the screen (in pixels). (0 - 500)
